name: Surf Excel Matic Top Load
description: Surf excel matic top load is designed to work in high water level (40 liters) of top load washing machines. Surf excel matic top load laundry detergent dissolves completely leaving no residue on your clothes on in the machine. Surf excel matic top load laundry detergent has an advanced technology that gives you handwash like clean in machines itself. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
